<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// getExtendImm - Encode the extend type and amount for a load/store inst:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   doshift:     should the offset be scaled by the access size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   shifter: 0 ==&gt; uxtb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///            1 ==&gt; uxth</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///            10 ==&gt; uxtw</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///            100 ==&gt; sxtb</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///            101 ==&gt; sxth</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///            110 ==&gt; sxtw</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#123;0&#125;  = doshift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a1f2b2edb37104fc026a966265dfedc8b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a1f2b2edb37104fc026a966265dfedc8b">getMemExtendImm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a7e75394a33f6a5897d7a14c0ba5d44f1">AArch64&#95;AM::ShiftExtendType</a> ET,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// processLogicalImmediate - Determine if an immediate value can be encoded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as the immediate operand of a logical instruction for the given register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// size.  If so, return true with &quot;encoding&quot; set to the encoded value in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the form N:immr:imms.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a2cd3e23b97b495a98c0b723ab18e4d96"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a2cd3e23b97b495a98c0b723ab18e4d96">processLogicalImmediate</a>(uint64&#95;t Imm, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64mipeepholeopt-cpp/#a9c374320ed4e895f9afa199987182bd2">RegSize</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           uint64&#95;t &amp;Encoding) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm == 0ULL || Imm == ~0ULL ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64mipeepholeopt-cpp/#a9c374320ed4e895f9afa199987182bd2">RegSize</a> != 64 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (Imm &gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64mipeepholeopt-cpp/#a9c374320ed4e895f9afa199987182bd2">RegSize</a> != 0 || Imm == (~0ULL &gt;&gt; (64 - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64mipeepholeopt-cpp/#a9c374320ed4e895f9afa199987182bd2">RegSize</a>)))))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, determine the element size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64mipeepholeopt-cpp/#a9c374320ed4e895f9afa199987182bd2">RegSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> /= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Mask = (1ULL &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Imm &amp; Mask) != ((Imm &gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &amp; Mask)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &#42;= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Second, determine the rotation to make the element be: 0^m 1^n.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t CTO, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Mask = ((uint64&#95;t)-1LL) &gt;&gt; (64 - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Imm &amp;= Mask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a582e08755c7a8d1b0bf6c5dcb765aaa8">isShiftedMask&#95;64</a>(Imm)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Imm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; 64 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;undefined behavior&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CTO = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239abca11deebf2731206dd41cf43c0e">llvm::countr&#95;one</a>(Imm &gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Imm |= ~Mask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a582e08755c7a8d1b0bf6c5dcb765aaa8">isShiftedMask&#95;64</a>(~Imm))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CLO = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8d92de57590536d2f254fe5e903e3372">llvm::countl&#95;one</a>(Imm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 64 - CLO;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CTO = CLO + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a239abca11deebf2731206dd41cf43c0e">llvm::countr&#95;one</a>(Imm) - (64 - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode in Immr the number of RORs it would take to get &#42;from&#42; 0^m 1^n</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to our target value, where I is the number of RORs to go the opposite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// direction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;I should be smaller than element size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Immr = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If size has a 1 in the n&#39;th bit, create a value that has zeroes in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits &#91;0, n&#93; and ones above that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t NImms = ~(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>-1) &lt;&lt; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Or the CTO value into the low bits, which must be below the Nth bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bit mentioned above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NImms |= (CTO-1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extract the seventh bit and toggle it to create the N field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = ((NImms &gt;&gt; 6) &amp; 1) ^ 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Encoding = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt;&lt; 12) | (Immr &lt;&lt; 6) | (NImms &amp; 0x3f);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// isLogicalImmediate - Return true if the immediate is valid for a logical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// immediate instruction of the given register size. Return false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a262431cccd14e6063eacc180130a5882"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a262431cccd14e6063eacc180130a5882">isLogicalImmediate</a>(uint64&#95;t imm, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> regSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t encoding;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a2cd3e23b97b495a98c0b723ab18e4d96">processLogicalImmediate</a>(imm, regSize, encoding);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// encodeLogicalImmediate - Return the encoded immediate value for a logical</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// immediate instruction of the given register size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a832ad315a355f4ddcc32f189f34e28a9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a832ad315a355f4ddcc32f189f34e28a9">encodeLogicalImmediate</a>(uint64&#95;t imm, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> regSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t encoding = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> res = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a2cd3e23b97b495a98c0b723ab18e4d96">processLogicalImmediate</a>(imm, regSize, encoding);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(res &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;invalid logical immediate&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (void)res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> encoding;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// decodeLogicalImmediate - Decode a logical immediate value in the form</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &quot;N:immr:imms&quot; (where the immr and imms fields are each 6 bits) into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// integer value it represents with regSize bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a1affd6d7e8a280fa6a0b642a6e0734b8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a1affd6d7e8a280fa6a0b642a6e0734b8">decodeLogicalImmediate</a>(uint64&#95;t val, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> regSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extract the N, imms, and immr fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = (val &gt;&gt; 12) &amp; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> immr = (val &gt;&gt; 6) &amp; 0x3f;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> imms = val &amp; 0x3f;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((regSize == 64 || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == 0) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;undefined logical immediate encoding&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> len = 31 - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt;&lt; 6) | (~imms &amp; 0x3f));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(len &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;undefined logical immediate encoding&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> = (1 &lt;&lt; len);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R = immr &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> S = imms &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(S != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> - 1 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;undefined logical immediate encoding&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t pattern = (1ULL &lt;&lt; (S + 1)) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; R; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    pattern = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#aa95984b1da1308f393b2c8d292126511">ror</a>(pattern, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replicate the pattern to fill the regSize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> != regSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">    pattern |= (pattern &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> &#42;= 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> pattern;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// isValidDecodeLogicalImmediate - Check to see if the logical immediate value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in the form &quot;N:immr:imms&quot; (where the immr and imms fields are each 6 bits)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is a valid encoding for an integer value with regSize bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a0a33ab78776cbb20a7b285e6f165888c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a0a33ab78776cbb20a7b285e6f165888c">isValidDecodeLogicalImmediate</a>(uint64&#95;t val,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> regSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extract the N and imms fields needed for checking.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = (val &gt;&gt; 12) &amp; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> imms = val &amp; 0x3f;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (regSize == 32 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> != 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// undefined logical immediate encoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> len = 31 - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt;&lt; 6) | (~imms &amp; 0x3f));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (len &lt; 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// undefined logical immediate encoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> = (1 &lt;&lt; len);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> S = imms &amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (S == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> - 1) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// undefined logical immediate encoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Floating-point Immediates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a6517f30a8205ebfe6689d35d925fa5a9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a6517f30a8205ebfe6689d35d925fa5a9">getFPImmFloat</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We expect an 8-bit binary encoding of a floating-point number here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t Sign = (Imm &gt;&gt; 7) &amp; 0x1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t Exp = (Imm &gt;&gt; 4) &amp; 0x7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t Mantissa = Imm &amp; 0xf;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   8-bit FP    IEEE Float Encoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   abcd efgh   aBbbbbbc defgh000 0 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where B = NOT(b);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= Sign &lt;&lt; 31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= ((Exp &amp; 0x4) != 0 ? 0 : 1) &lt;&lt; 30;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= ((Exp &amp; 0x4) != 0 ? 31 : 0) &lt;&lt; 25;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= (Exp &amp; 0x3) &lt;&lt; 23;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= Mantissa &lt;&lt; 19;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aab3863f16cb0767af49f0dd63bc5aa90">bit&#95;cast&lt;float&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// getFP16Imm - Return an 8-bit floating-point version of the 16-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// floating-point value. If the value cannot be represented as an 8-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// floating-point value, then return -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#ab23f031bf813c9284ac27776b414a867"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#ab23f031bf813c9284ac27776b414a867">getFP16Imm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t Sign = Imm.lshr(15).getZExtValue() &amp; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int32&#95;t Exp = (Imm.lshr(10).getSExtValue() &amp; 0x1f) - 15;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -14 to 15</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int32&#95;t Mantissa = Imm.getZExtValue() &amp; 0x3ff;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 10 bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can handle 4 bits of mantissa.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mantissa = (16+UInt(e:f:g:h))/16.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Mantissa &amp; 0x3f)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Mantissa &gt;&gt;= 6;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can handle 3 bits of exponent: exp == UInt(NOT(b):c:d)-3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Exp &lt; -3 || Exp &gt; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Exp = ((Exp+3) &amp; 0x7) ^ 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)Sign &lt;&lt; 7) | (Exp &lt;&lt; 4) | Mantissa;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">         ((Imm &amp; 0x0000ffffffffffffULL) == 0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a6da348f7ca3bc56096e6a409b4ce67c4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a6da348f7ca3bc56096e6a409b4ce67c4">encodeAdvSIMDModImmType12</a>(uint64&#95;t Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BitA = (Imm &amp; 0x8000000000000000ULL) != 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BitB = (Imm &amp; 0x0040000000000000ULL) != 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BitC = (Imm &amp; 0x0020000000000000ULL) != 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BitD = (Imm &amp; 0x0010000000000000ULL) != 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BitE = (Imm &amp; 0x0008000000000000ULL) != 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BitF = (Imm &amp; 0x0004000000000000ULL) != 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BitG = (Imm &amp; 0x0002000000000000ULL) != 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t BitH = (Imm &amp; 0x0001000000000000ULL) != 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t EncVal = BitA;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal |= BitB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal |= BitC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal |= BitD;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal |= BitE;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal |= BitF;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal |= BitG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal &lt;&lt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EncVal |= BitH;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EncVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a41cd1be17511908a999b34fac029554d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64-am/#a41cd1be17511908a999b34fac029554d">decodeAdvSIMDModImmType12</a>(uint8&#95;t Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t EncVal = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x80) EncVal |= 0x8000000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x40) EncVal |= 0x3fc0000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight">            EncVal |= 0x4000000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x20) EncVal |= 0x0020000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x10) EncVal |= 0x0010000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x08) EncVal |= 0x0008000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x04) EncVal |= 0x0004000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x02) EncVal |= 0x0002000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 0x01) EncVal |= 0x0001000000000000ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EncVal &lt;&lt; 32) | EncVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
